channel.title: personal on OZONIL
channel.description: Recent content in personal on OZONIL

item.title: Learning
item.description: Things I learned today: Changing ownership of files: sudo chown ozonil:ozonil foo.txt Writing files in vim: :w path/to/directory/filename.txt. I can’t imagine how I missed that. Fundamental. But I was never a heavy vim user so forgivable I guess. Setting up tags in hugo from this blog. Got to learn about custom variables and a bit about the hugo templating. tar unzipping files from the terminal: tar -xf file.tar.gz. shortcuts for navigating man pages: ’n’ to scroll to next line and ‘y’ to scroll to previous line.

item.title: Second post
item.description: Immediate followup. CSS is messed up after deployment. Must have something to do with how I didn’t do something. It still looks pretty though. Time to let it go and move on to more immediate commitments. The time it takes to move from creating a new post with hugo new post/post.md with editing the generated page, adding, commiting and pushing is so low that I should be able to crank out posts fast.

item.title: First post
item.description: Yet another attempt at making this happen. I have a few guard rails setup this time, so hope it works out.
